languages.text: {n}В назначенный час во всех ульях столицы блюстители начали одновременные облавы. Делая ставку на скрытность и внезапность, они пренебрегали тяжелым вооружением.{/n}
{n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В назначенный час во всех ульях столицы блюстители начали одновременные облавы. Делая ставку на скрытность и внезапность, они пренебрегали тяжелым вооружением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At the appointed time, the enforces had started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use the heavy machinery.{/n}

{n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}预定的时间到了，执法者同时对首都的所有巢都发起袭击。他们没有使用任何重型战争器械，完全依靠隐匿与奇袭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}预定的时间到了，执法者同时对首都的所有巢都发起袭击。他们没有使用任何重型战争器械，完全依靠隐匿与奇袭。{/n}
{n}预定的时间到了，执法者同时对首都的所有巢都发起袭击。他们没有使用重型器械，完全依靠隐匿与奇袭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A la hora acordada, los guardias dieron comienzo a sus asaltos simultáneos en todas las colmenas de la capital. Utilizaron el sigilo y la sorpresa en lugar de las armas pesadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A la hora acordada, los guardias dieron comienzo a sus asaltos simultáneos en todas las colmenas de la capital. Utilizaron el sigilo y la sorpresa en lugar de las armas pesadas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}定刻になると、エンフォーサーは首都にあるすべてのハイヴへ一斉に襲撃を開始した。奴らはステルス技術と奇襲に頼り、兵器を使用しなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}定刻になると、エンフォーサーは首都にあるすべてのハイヴへ一斉に襲撃を開始した。奴らはステルス技術と奇襲に頼り、重機を使用しなかった。{/n}
{n}定刻になると、エンフォーサーは首都にあるすべてのハイヴへ一斉に襲撃を開始した。奴らはステルス技術と奇襲に頼り、重機を使用しなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'heure prévue, les prévôts lancent des attaques simultanées sur toutes les ruches de la capitale. Privilégiant l'effet de surprise et la discrétion, ils n'ont pas recours à de l'armement lourd.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'heure prévue, les prévôts lancent des attaques simultanées sur toutes les ruches de la capitale. Privilégiant l'effet de surprise et la discrétion, ils n'ont pas recours à de l'armement lourd.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zur vereinbarten Zeit führten die Enforcer in allen Makropolen der Hauptwelt simultane Razzien durch. Da sie auf Heimlichkeit und Überraschung setzten, kamen keine schweren Waffen zum Einsatz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zur vereinbarten Zeit führten die Enforcer in allen Makropolen der Hauptwelt simultane Razzien durch. Da sie auf Heimlichkeit und Überraschung setzten, kamen keine schweren Waffen zum Einsatz.{/n}

{n}Zur vereinbarten Zeit haben die Enforcers in allen Makropolen auf der Hauptwelt ihre simultanen Razzien gestartet. Der Fokus lag dabei auf Heimlichkeit und Überraschung, es kam kein schweres Gerät zum Einsatz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnfazcılar, belirlenen saatte başkentin tüm kovanlarına düzenlenen eş zamanlı baskınlarına başladı. Gizlilik ve sürpriz faktörlerine bel bağlayan infazcılar, ağır savaş silahları kullanmadılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the enforcers started their simultaneous raids in all the hives of the capital. Relying on stealth and surprise, they did not use heavy weapons of war.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İnfazcılar, belirlenen saatte başkentin tüm kovanlarına düzenlenen eş zamanlı baskınlarına başladı. Gizlilik ve sürpriz faktörlerine bel bağlayan infazcılar, ağır savaş silahları kullanmadılar.{/n}
